EmailTemplate.subject: WEX Fleet One Cards Deliver Greater Control and Convenience
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for the opportunity to speak with you today. I not only wanted to introduce myself, but also make sure you were aware of everything WEX Fleet One can offer you to manage your company's vehicles. Listed below are a few highlights of our product offerings today. Since the acquisition by WEX, Inc in 2012 there are many exciting changes and improvements currently taking place.
Factoring – Accelerated Cash Flow, Powerful Real-Time Reporting, Fuel Card Funding and Flexible Pricing Structure with no hidden fees.
WEX Fuel Management – Applications designed exclusively for wherever you are in the fuel supply chain. These tailored offerings address industry-specific needs to help companies optimize fuel purchases and processes, and adapt quickly to changing market demands.
Permits - Purchase the necessary temporary permits your drivers need including Trip, Fuel, and Oversize/Overweight.
Telematics – An easy-to-use fleet vehicle tracking solution that helps you monitor fuel use and driver behavior - anytime, anywhere.
Cash Services – Cash Advances. ATM access. PlusChek® Services.
Do you have vehicles in your fleet with less than 18 wheels? WEX Fleet One has got you covered. We offer feature-packed savings for your gasoline vehicles too!
Please feel free to take a moment to see what our customers have to say about their experience with WEX Fleet One.
Again, thank you for your time and I will be in touch with you in the weeks ahead. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
www.fleetone.com
